nodes.name: Atualizar Cartão com Links de Áudio

assignments.name: Prompt
assignments.value: Voice: Clear, authoritative, and composed — projecting confidence and professionalism.Tone: Neutral and informative — maintaining a balance between formality and approachability.Punctuation: Structured with commas and purposeful pauses — ensuring clarity, digestibility, and smooth pacing.Delivery: Steady and measured — with subtle emphasis on key figures, dates, and deadlines to guide attention.Accent: American English — standard U.S. pronunciation with natural intonation, ensuring clarity and familiarity for an English-speaking audience.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.value: Voice: Clear, authoritative, and composed, projecting confidence and professionalism, delivered with a neutral American English accent, ensuring clarity, credibility, and ease of understanding across a wide U.S. audience.|Tone: Neutral and informative, striking a balance between formality and conversational ease. The tone reflects standard American business and broadcast norms, avoiding regionalisms or colloquialisms that may distract from the message.Punctuation: Structured with commas and strategic pauses, aligned with typical American English speech rhythm, ensuring key points are segmented and delivered clearly.Delivery: Steady and measured, with slight emphasis on numbers, dates, and critical terms. Stress patterns and intonation follow General American pronunciation, with crisp consonants and well-defined vowels — conveying confidence, professionalism, and a sense of approachability.

parameters.name: User-Agent
parameters.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/135.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
